title: Riot im sorry for that report
body: I reported a player known as ''breadfish16'' and I reported him for no absolute reason, and wrote that he's a racial slur. I'm sorry, I did not mean to send this report, I just wanted to screenshot it and send it to him for a joke. Please forgive me!

replies.body: Weeeeeeell that's not cool to do xD! I wouldn't worry too much since one report doesn't mean an automatic punishment. Still, I'd probably not do that in the future hah xP
